dma.name: Strategy I (US)
dma.description: An Accumulation Strategy that scales investment aggressively as prices drop below a Dynamic Moving Average (optimized for market state). Includes a Sentiment Filter (VADER) to suppress buys during negative news cycles. Note: This analysis is performed on the top 100 stocks from S&P 500 holdings. Baseline refers to the standard Buy & Hold strategy return for the same period. Forward Testing serves as a real-time validation mechanism that is updated daily. It operates on the strict assumption that every buy signal results in a trade executed at the daily closing price. This ensures that the performance metrics reflect a realistic and consistent execution model, free from look-ahead bias, by treating every signal as a definitive action taken at the market close.

dma_bo.name: Strategy I (India)
dma_bo.description: An Accumulation Strategy that scales investment aggressively as prices drop below a Dynamic Moving Average (optimized for market state). Includes a Sentiment Filter (VADER) to suppress buys during negative news cycles. Note: This analysis is performed on the top 50 stocks from Nifty 50 holdings. Baseline refers to the standard Buy & Hold strategy return for the same period. Forward Testing serves as a real-time validation mechanism that is updated daily. It operates on the strict assumption that every buy signal results in a trade executed at the daily closing price. This ensures that the performance metrics reflect a realistic and consistent execution model, free from look-ahead bias, by treating every signal as a definitive action taken at the market close.

dma_hmm.name: Strategy II: DMA + Hidden Markov Model
dma_hmm.description: Enhances the standard DMA strategy by overlaying a Hidden Markov Model (HMM) to detect market regimes (e.g., Bull vs. Bear). Trades are only taken when the HMM indicates a favorable regime.

dma_hmm_bo.name: Strategy II (India)
dma_hmm_bo.description: The HMM-enhanced strategy applied to Indian markets.

pv.name: Peak Valley (US)
pv.description: Combines RSI and MACD indicators to identify oversold conditions and bullish crossovers. Trades are filtered using a Simple Moving Average (SMA) to ensure alignment with the broader trend, and optionally ADX to confirm trend strength. Note: This analysis is performed on the top 100 stocks from S&P 500 holdings, and only reports tickers with a backtesting accuracy greater than 50%. Forward testing tracks real performance of the portfolio. Every time a BUY signal is generated for any stock, it buys 100 USD worth of shares. Every time a SELL (or Stop Loss, Take Profit, Exit) is generated, it sells all the shares. It logs the performance of the total portfolio over time.
